advancements.adorn.everything.title: 장식 마스터
advancements.adorn.everything.descriptio: Adorn에 있는 모든 장식 블록을 만드세요.
block.adorn.terrestria.mossy_basalt_bric: 이끼 낀 Volcanic Rock 벽돌 기둥
이끼 낀 Volcanic Rock 벽돌 플랫폼
이끼 낀 Volcanic Rock 벽돌 발판
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.title: Brewers
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.text: Brewers cook various beverages for you to enjoy. Hover over the diagram below for details!
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.mug_slot: Your empty mug goes here, and it'll be filled up.
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.tank_slot: The tank on the right can be filled here.
guide.adorn.topic.brewer.tank: A tank for fluid ingredients. You can use e.g. water as a fluid instead of a water bucket.
guide.adorn.topic.building_blocks.title: Building blocks
guide.adorn.topic.chimney.title: Chimneys
guide.adorn.topic.chimney.text: Chimneys make little smoke clouds. They can also be stacked on top of each other to make them higher.
guide.adorn.topic.drawer.text: You can store items in drawers. They can't store as many items as chests, but you can also use them as small tables or nightstands.
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen.title: Kitchen blocks
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen.text: Kitchen counters and cupboards can be used to decorate your kitchens. You can store items in cupboards.
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen_sink.title: Kitchen sinks
guide.adorn.topic.kitchen_sink.text: You can store water and other fluids in kitchen sinks. They are infinite sources of water, and the water can be cleared out using a sponge.
guide.adorn.topic.post.title: Posts
guide.adorn.topic.post.text: Posts are like fence posts. They don't connect to other posts.
guide.adorn.topic.platform.title: Platforms
guide.adorn.topic.platform.text: Platforms have a thin platform part over a post.
guide.adorn.topic.prismarine_chimney.tex: Prismarine chimneys make bubbles underwater. Like other chimneys, you can stack them on top of each other. Some prismarine chimneys can also create bubble columns.
guide.adorn.topic.shelf.title: Shelves
guide.adorn.topic.shelf.text: Shelves can be used to show your fancy items to guests.
guide.adorn.topic.chair.title: 의자s
guide.adorn.topic.drawer.title: 서랍s
guide.adorn.topic.step.title: Steps
guide.adorn.topic.step.text: Steps are a smaller version of platforms. They can be used to build staircases with posts and platforms.
guide.adorn.topic.trading_station.title: Trading stations
guide.adorn.topic.trading_station.text: See the Trader's Manual for information about trading stations.
guide.adorn.contents.title: Contents
item.adorn.traders_manual.subtitle: 거래 탁자를 사용하세요
item.adorn.traders_manual.buying.title: 구매
item.adorn.traders_manual.buying.text: You can buy items from trading stations by using the station with the payment item.
item.adorn.traders_manual.selling.title: 판매
item.adorn.traders_manual.selling.text: Setting up your own trading stations is very simple! Just place down a trading station and open it. On the left side, you can set the product and the payment. The inventory on the right side will have the products and the payments.
gamerule.adorn:skipNightOnSofas: Skip nights by sleeping on sofas
gamerule.adorn:skipNightOnSofas.descript: Allows you to skip the night when you sleep on a sofa.
gamerule.adorn:infiniteKitchenSinks.desc: Makes kitchen sinks infinite sources for infinite fluids like water.
gamerule.adorn:dropLockedTradingStations: Broken trading stations drop a locked version with their contents inside.
gui.adorn.config.title: Adorn
gui.adorn.config.option.showItemsInStand: Shows Adorn items in standard vanilla creative inventory tabs.
gui.adorn.config.option.showTradingStati: Shows information about trading stations when you look at them.
gui.adorn.config.restart_required.title: Restart required!
gui.adorn.config.restart_required.messag: One of your changed options requires Minecraft to be restarted.
guide.adorn.topic.table.title: 탁자s
guide.adorn.topic.table.text: 탁자s are a great decoration for your kitchens and dining rooms!
block.adorn.byg.mossy_red_rock_brick_pos: 이끼 낀 붉은 바위 벽돌 기둥
block.adorn.byg.cracked_red_rock_brick_p: 금 간 붉은 바위 벽돌 기둥

block.adorn.byg.mossy_red_rock_brick_ste: 이끼 낀 붉은 바위 벽돌 발판
block.adorn.byg.cracked_red_rock_brick_s: 금 간 붉은 바위 벽돌 발판
guide.adorn.topic.sofa.title: 소파s
block.adorn.byg.green_enchanted_coffee_t: 초록색 마법이 부여된 나무 커피 테이블
guide.adorn.topic.sofa.text: 소파s are a comfortable place to sit. You can also take a nap on a wide sofa if you use it with an empty hand while sneaking.
guide.adorn.topic.chair.text: 의자s are a nice spot for miners and farmers to sit down after a hard day of work.
block.adorn.byg.blue_enchanted_coffee_ta: 파란색 마법이 부여된 나무 커피 테이블
